about.welcome_title: Welcome to Free Zone Online Shopping Mall
about.welcome_text: Free Zone is a modern online shopping platform where you can discover top-quality products from a wide range of brands. We partner with
about.welcome_text2: to bring you a diverse selection and unbeatable deals.
about.advantages_text: Here’s what makes our services stand out:
about.advantage2: Fast and convenient delivery & payment options
about.mission_text: Our mission is to provide our customers with a seamless, enjoyable, and rewarding online shopping experience. By understanding your needs and preferences, we offer a wide range of high-quality products at competitive prices.
about.mission1: Deliver the best online shopping experience
about.mission3: Maintain long-lasting partnerships with our suppliers
about.mission4: Build trust and lasting relationships with our customers
about.quote: We are committed to ensuring your satisfaction and providing an exceptional online shopping experience.

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.intro: When making online purchases on the Free Zone platform, customers can make payments in the following ways: non-cash or cash.
payment.non_cash_intro: The following payment methods are available for non-cash payments:
payment.method1: Telcell Wallet, Idram, Fastshift payment systems
payment.method2: ARCA, Visa, MasterCard and Maestro payment cards
payment.method6: POS terminal by paying the courier before receiving the order
payment.cash: Cash payment is possible only by paying the courier in AMD prior to receiving the order.
payment.register: The use of cash registers is not mandatory for remote sales conducted via electronic communication or television shops.

delivery.title: Delivery Terms
delivery.intro: Orders made via the Free Zone platform are carried out according to the following schedule:
delivery.option1: From restaurants, shops, pharmacies – up to 45 minutes
delivery.note: These timeframes may vary depending on the number of order registration points and traffic congestion.
delivery.preorder: Customers have options to pre-order by specifying a preferred delivery time.
delivery.rate1: Within Yerevan city up to 2 km – 400 AMD; for each additional kilometer the cost increases by 120 AMD
delivery.rate2: In the regions – 150 AMD per kilometer, calculated from the center of Yerevan
delivery.rate_note: These prices are subject to change based on the number of order registration points, partnership conditions, and order specifics.
